<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Is this actually dangerous as WritingAnLLVMPass.html claims? Seems</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        that, short of multithreaded LLVM, it should be safe; all that is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        necessary is that a simple Module::iterator loop not be invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        Appending to the GlobalVariable list is safe in that sense.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        All of the output passes emit globals last. The ExecutionEngine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        explicitly supports adding globals to the module after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        initialization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        Still, if it isn&#39;t deemed acceptable, then this transformation needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        to be a ModulePass (which means it cannot be in the &#39;llc&#39; pipeline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        (which uses a FunctionPassManager (which segfaults (not asserts) if</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AtEntry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b01712e5f196d6d3d021ef23aad50e4">CreateLoad</a>(AtEntry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab73bb6948312ca0f98055c6a74c37045">getPtrTy</a>(), Head, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;currhead&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;EntryMapPtr = CreateGEP(Context, AtEntry, ConcreteStackEntryTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       StackEntry, 0, 1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;frame.map&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AtEntry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aabfc20af4dcf7d94262824dcac2e7bed">CreateStore</a>(FrameMap, EntryMapPtr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// After all the allocas...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, E = Roots.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each root, find the corresponding slot in the aggregate...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SlotPtr = CreateGEP(Context, AtEntry, ConcreteStackEntryTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               StackEntry, 1 + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;root&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And use it in lieu of the alloca.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;OriginalAlloca = Roots&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SlotPtr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#ae855357b6c5e6e7ed1869272708a3a84">takeName</a>(OriginalAlloca);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OriginalAlloca-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(SlotPtr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Move past the original stores inserted by GCStrategy::InitRoots. This isn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// really necessary (the collector would never see the intermediate state at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// runtime), but it&#39;s nicer not to push the half-initialized entry onto the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shadow stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(IP))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AtEntry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(IP-&gt;getParent(), IP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push the entry onto the shadow stack.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;EntryNextPtr = CreateGEP(Context, AtEntry, ConcreteStackEntryTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        StackEntry, 0, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;frame.next&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;NewHeadVal = CreateGEP(Context, AtEntry, ConcreteStackEntryTy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      StackEntry, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;newhead&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AtEntry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aabfc20af4dcf7d94262824dcac2e7bed">CreateStore</a>(CurrentHead, EntryNextPtr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AtEntry.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aabfc20af4dcf7d94262824dcac2e7bed">CreateStore</a>(NewHeadVal, Head);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each instruction that escapes...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/escapeenumerator">EscapeEnumerator</a> EE(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;cleanup&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;HandleExceptions=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, DTU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &#42;AtExit = EE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/escapeenumerator/#ac63ecd195310b8a31b445bb613028893">Next</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pop the entry from the shadow stack. Don&#39;t reuse CurrentHead from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AtEntry, since that would make the value live for the entire function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;EntryNextPtr2 =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CreateGEP(Context, &#42;AtExit, ConcreteStackEntryTy, StackEntry, 0, 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;frame.next&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SavedHead =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">        AtExit-&gt;CreateLoad(AtExit-&gt;getPtrTy(), EntryNextPtr2, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;gc&#95;savedhead&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AtExit-&gt;CreateStore(SavedHead, Head);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete the original allocas (which are no longer used) and the intrinsic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls (which are no longer valid). Doing this last avoids invalidating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::pair&lt;CallInst &#42;, AllocaInst &#42;&gt; &amp;Root : Roots) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Root.first-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Root.second-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"></CodeLine>
